code: import axios from'axios';import{options}from'../utils/constant';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{getTrailerMovie}from'../redux/movieSlice';import{useEffect}from'react';const useMovieById=async movieId=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{const getMovieById=async()=>{try{var _res$data,_res$data$results;const res=await axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(movieId,"/videos"),options);console.log(res.data.results);const trailer=res===null||res===void 0?void 0:(_res$data=res.data)===null||_res$data===void 0?void 0:(_res$data$results=_res$data.results)===null||_res$data$results===void 0?void 0:_res$data$results.filter(item=>{return item.type==="Trailer";});dispatch(getTrailerMovie(trailer.length>0?trailer[0]:res.data.results[0]));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};getMovieById();},[]);};export default useMovieById;
